text: Abdullah Gül (born 29 October 1950) is a Turkish politician. He was the President of Turkey, He served from 2007 to 2014. He was Prime Minister from 2002 to 2003, and Minister of Foreign Affairs from 2003 to 2007. Gül was born on 29 October 1950 in Kayseri, Turkey. He studied at Istanbul University and at the University of Exeter. Gül has been married to Hayrünnisa Gül since 1980. They had three children. ==Other websites== *Presidency of the Republic of Turkey * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Turkey Category:Prime ministers of Turkey Category:Honorary Knights Grand Cross of the Order of the Bath Category:Alumni of the University of Exeter Category:21st-century presidents of Turkey Category:21st-century prime ministers of Turkey
title: Abdullah Gül
